message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $9,500. Can you consider that?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate the offer, but I can't go lower than $11,000. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd like to make another counteroffer of $9,800. Can you meet me in the middle?
